playlists.name: International
playlists.description: This is the first default playlist, it plays whenever nothing is scheduled or is available

playlists.name: Fillers
playlists.description: This is the second default playlist, it plays whenever there is no internet connection

news.messages:
Olina omukisa okulaba program ezenjawulo; ezobulamu, enyimba, obujulizi, ebiseera ebyomumaaso wano ku 3ABN TV. Jitege ate otegeezeko omulala.
#Tosubwa program Bwatyo bwayogera mukama buli saawa 2 ezikiro (Sunday - Thursday), 1 ezikiro (Friday).
#Tosubwa program Yimba Nange nga tukuleetedde Kanyanya SDA church choir ku saawa 3 ezikiro Saturday, Monday ne Wednesday eno
#Tokwata 3ABN-TV, yakubuzeeko... Kola oba damu Search ku free to air decoder
